name: Illadelphia Woodgrain Label Beaker Waterpipe
description:
Fresh from Illadelph's 17"/43cm Baby Beaker range, this clear glass waterpipe is made from premium 5mm schott duran borosilicate glass. It features the now iconic Illadelph Woodgrain logo with platinum outline on the front and matching Illadelph shield on the back. A 6"/12cm long diffuser downstem made from amber glass, also features the same woodgrain logo and finishes off the piece. It is fitted with a classic 14mm Illadelph glass bowl. A keck clip is included for added safety.

This piece is shipped in original Illadelph packaging.

FREE SHIPPING
